rows.label: tlk41300021_02_msg0001
rows.name:
A long time ago, there was a city in
Gula known only as the White Chair.

rows.label: tlk41300021_02_msg0002
rows.name:
It had the oldest and richest history
of any city in the land, and boasted a
fortress many considered impenetrable.

rows.label: tlk41300021_02_msg0003
rows.name:
But that city was destroyed by the
Superbian Empire. Razed to the ground,
until nothing remained.

rows.label: tlk41300021_02_msg0004
rows.name:
The destruction of the White Chair was
what prompted Gula to surrender
their sovereignty to Superbia.

rows.label: tlk41300021_02_msg0005
rows.name:
But this all happened long before I
was born. I don't resent Superbia
for what their ancestors did.
